meanings: submission, surrender, 굴복하다 submit[surrender, yield, give in] (to)
submit (to), yield (to), (formal) succumb (to), give in (to); (항복하다) surrender (to)

vlive.korean: 더위에 굴복하지 않아요. We don't succumb to the heat. 듣기 View video IDOL x IDOL : Various - 베리어스 '가자! 월미도로~'
vlive.english: We don't succumb to the heat.

vlive.korean: [집요한 부름에 굴복 당할 수밖에...] [And she had to surrender...] View video 졸잼티비 (joLjamTV) : [플랜맨_북해도] 북해도의 마지막은 화려하게 _ 18회
상남자는 이런거에 굴복하지 않아요. A real man never gives up on something like this. 듣기 View video AKMU : [AKMU의 사춘기노트 p.7] '사랑과 우정사이'
vlive.english: A real man never gives up on something like this.

vlive.korean: [결국 악마의 유혹에 굴복한 막내] 레츠 고. 가자, 가자. [Youngest follows the devil] Let's go, move. 듣기 View video ASTRO : [ASTRO PROJECT] 아스트로 프로젝트 : 아.시.아 2회
vlive.english: [Youngest follows the devil] Let's go, move.

vlive.korean: [여러분 고기가 이렇게 무섭습니다] 남준이 형 고기에 굴복했다고. [The meat is so powerful] He succumbed to the meat. 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2017 - EP.28
vlive.english: [The meat is so powerful] He succumbed to the meat.

examples.korean: He refused to give in to bullying and threats. 발음듣기 그는 협박과 괴롭힘에 굴복하지 않았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He refused to give in to bullying and threats. 발음

examples.korean: The government eventually bowed to popular pressure. 발음듣기 마침내 정부가 대중의 압력에 굴복했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The government eventually bowed to popular pressure. 발음

examples.korean: She would have scorned to stoop to such tactics. 발음듣기 그녀라면 그러한 술책에 굴복하는 것은 거부했을 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She would have scorned to stoop to such tactics. 발음

examples.korean: They were finally forced to capitulate to the terrorists’ demands. 발음듣기 그들은 마침내 테러범들의 요구에 굴복해야 하게 되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They were finally forced to capitulate to the terrorists’ demands. 발음

examples.korean: He reluctantly yielded to their demands. 발음듣기 그는 마지못해 그들의 요구에 굴복했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He reluctantly yielded to their demands. 발음
